title: Tango Sunday: Tales On the Edge
description: "Tango Sunday" is a collection of fictional short stories about life on the edge. In Janet Brennan's seventh book, she never fails to seduce the reader into realizing that life is not always as it seems to be. True to Janet Brennan's style and philosophy, she titillates the ready with good doses of revenge, ghosties, life in the spiritual world and death. Author Brennan aptly demonstrates in these dark and twilight zone tales that "Life simply is."
author: Janet K. Brennan
